blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: Blood of a Dead Man Risen
title: Blood of a Dead Man Risen
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2V5hv3k

by JanecShannon

Loki uses Tony’s blood in a spell but it has unexpected side effects.

Now Loki’s curiosity is piqued and Tony may never get a moment’s peace again.

Words: 1723, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Iron Man (Movies)
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Loki (Marvel), Tony Stark
  • Relationships: Loki/Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Enemies to Friends to Lovers, Kidnapping is not how you make friends, I’m looking at you Loki, Blood, Canon-Typical Violence, cursing, the Avengers are a family


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2V5hv3k

summary: Patchwork - Chapter 1 - MCUsic_to_my_ears - Marvel Cinematic Universe [Archive of Our Own]
title: Patchwork - Chapter 1 - MCUsic_to_my_ears - Marvel Cinematic Universe [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 13/13
Fandom: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Marvel, The Incredible Hulk - All Media Types, Iron Man - All Media Types, Captain America - All Media Types
Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, No Archive Warnings Apply
Relationships: Steve Rogers/Tony Stark
Characters: Bruce Banner, Steve Rogers, Tony Stark, Peter Parker, Jennifer Walters, Elaine Walters, Morris Walters, Rebecca Banner (mentioned), Brian Banner, Happy Hogan, Pepper Potts, James “Rhodey” Rhodes
Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Modern Setting, Alternate Universe - No Powers, Alternate Universe - Foster Family, (kinda), Bruce Banner-centric, Kid Bruce Banner, Bruce Banner Needs a Hug, Bruce Banner Feels, Bruce Banner Has Issues, Bruce Banner Angst, Tony Stark Has A Heart, Tony Stark Has Issues, Protective Tony Stark, Parent Tony Stark, Protective Steve Rogers, Parent Steve Rogers, Kid Peter Parker, Peter Parker Has a Family, Superfamily, Minus the ‘Super’, Panic Attacks, Panic, Nightmares, Mental Health Issues, Tony Stark Doesn’t Become Ironman, Adoption, Foster Care, Court Cases, Bullying, Murder Trials, Graphic descriptions of violence, Murder, New York City, Central Park
Summary:

In the wake of Rebecca Banner’s murder, her son is placed into the loving hands of foster parents Steve Rogers and Tony Stark when his aunt is unable to take him in. After saying goodbye to his cousin, Jen, he meets his foster brother, Peter Parker, the adopted son of Steve and Tony. The family must learn to help Bruce cope with his trauma while the impending trial of Brian Banner looms over them.

blog.name: tiva-tonystark3000
blog.title: "Hey there, Juliet"
blog.description: Pepperony / Brutasha / Tiva /  Bughead / Rumbelle / Swanfire / Outlaw Queen / Frankenwolf / Stydia / Stelena / Bamon / Skyward / Olicity / Spuffy / Cangel / Dramione / Olitz / Gleggie / Flaurel / Joshaya / Rucas / Romitri

summary: Fuck everyone whos anti Tony Stark. Saying shit like “he’s the real villain” “he doesn’t care” “he’s selfish” like fuck you! and...
body: Fuck everyone whos anti Tony Stark. Saying shit like “he’s the real villain” “he doesn’t care” “he’s selfish” like fuck you! and fuck off! They give him so much shit and hate for attacking Bucky. First of all! It was an immediate response! If you found out the person next to you killed you’re parents, you telling me that you wouldn’t react violently!? ITS YOUR PARENTS! I’m Most definitely gonna not look at them and say “it’s kool” like, no Bitch! Brainwashed or not, I’m going to kick your ass until I’ve think You had enough. You lucky I don’t fucking kill you because I know it wasn’t really you. He just found out Bucky killed his mom and captain asshole knew about it and didn’t say shit. All you assholes that are saying “it wasn’t his fault, he was brainwashed. I wouldn’t have reacted so violently” get the fuck outta here with that bullshit! You know damn well you’d react the same way. I get and can accept that he was brainwashed and wasn’t entirely to blame, but HE’S the one that had their blood on his hands. Tony just needed to let off some aggression. He acted on his instinct right then and there. The Avengers was the worse thing that ever happened to him honestly, He deserves so much better.

summary:
*Tony with Gurdians of the galaxy crew*
Tony:Our odds may look slim, but
mantis: We kick names, take ass
Tony: ...
Peter:But...
body:
*Tony with Gurdians of the galaxy crew*


Tony:Our odds may look slim, but


mantis: We kick names, take ass


Tony: …


Peter:But What, Mr. Stark? You didn’t finish.


Tony: That’s it, our odds are slim.

summary: tony, about his father: i don’t know if he was discouraging me from being gay or encouraging me to be a classical composer, but...
body: tony, about his father: i don’t know if he was discouraging me from being gay or encouraging me to be a classical composer, but that is how he thought to phrase it to a 12-year-old boy. how would that ever work? like, years later, id be in college, about to go down on some rockin twink and id be like, “wait a second. what would leonard bernstein do?”

summary:
Tony: can we go for a walk? that always cheers me up
Natasha: I don’t think I can I’m too tired to walk
Tony: *carries Natasha...
body:
Tony: can we go for a walk? that always cheers me up

Natasha: I don’t think I can I’m too tired to walk

Tony: *carries Natasha on his back like she’s a sloth hugging a tree as they casually stroll around central park*

Marvel comic and movie verse fan works from AO3.

ao3feedmonster@gmail.com

summary: I Don't Like Your Boyfriend
title: I Don't Like Your Boyfriend
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2FwjN4M

by emmagnetised

“Barnes.” Tony’s voice was casual and acknowledging, almost like a… like a greeting.

Bucky’s head snapped up, his eyes wide, and Tony nodded at him.

For a good minute of silence Bucky just stared. Tony watched him from across the kitchen, his arms crossed over his chest as he waited for his coffee to finish brewing.

Then Bucky’s brain kicked back into gear. “Sta- Tony.” The name he’d settled on twisted up at the end, as if in a question.

Tony didn’t look like he knew the answer.

Words: 4391, Chapters: 1/3, Language: English

Series: Part 4 of All The Little Lights

Need to block antis or certain blogs check: *antis to block, #blogs to block, #blogs to report. Also tags you may need to blacklist if needed: #anti bs, #nsfw, #fandom wank.

summary: When everyone is free from the soul stone
title: When everyone is free from the soul stone
body:
Peter: Mr.Stark I'm- *sees Rocket* You got me a pet raccoon!?
Tony: No this is my team-mate
Rocket: I'm nobody's pet Also I'm a way cooler looking raccoon!
Stephen: Oh thank god I found you too. PLEASE take him * gives Groot to Rocket/
Groot: I am Groot.
Tony: Oh my god Stephen you got us a talking tree!?
